content.body: I guess if we wanted to address this issue at a broader level we'd work on creating TGs that have the authority to make decisions on things. We could have a Temporal TG that can just decide fully on these changes without bothering plenary, and everyone who may have an opinion is expected to attend. I'd be in favor of this process change, but we haven't done it yet.

I'd be in favor of this process change, but we haven't done it yet.
